timeline.bodyText: Might be a good idea to add this as a method in the Tags class. Something like Tag#getTagging()

replies.bodyText: ATM io.minio.S3Escaper is private and not available to io.minio.messages package.

timeline.bodyText: It might be better to add this annotation to the Builder class itself instead of one each and every setter method.

replies.bodyText: No. CopyConditions sets only "REPLACE" string. Hence Directive.REPLACE

timeline.bodyText:
Can be simplified using the Optional class as follows:
String srcObject = Optional.ofNullable(args.srcObject()).orElse(args.object());
timeline.author: anjalshireesh
